app_id.title: App ID
app_id.description: Enter your Gotcha app ID, available in your dashboard's Settings/Install page

app_code.title: App embed code
app_code.description: Your app embed code (GOTC-0000xx), available in your Gotcha settings page as well

name.title: User's name
name.description: Your logged-in user's name (first or full name)

avatar.title: User's avatar URL (**OPTIONAL)
avatar.description: The image URL of your user's avatar. Preferably HTTPS.

is_premium.title: Is the user premium (**OPTIONAL)
is_premium.description: If you want to mark paying users, you can pass here 1 or 0 to set if the user is a paying / premium users.
